KEY: In this stage of the financing application you will give insight of the organisation. You will focus on the nature of the undertaking business, the mission, vision, strategy, the products and services of the organisation and which markets the organisation serves. You will also give insights of the organisational structure, opportunities, threats, strengths and weaknesses of the organisation.
EN: In this stage of the financing application you will give insight of the organisation. You will focus on the nature of the undertaking business, the mission, vision, strategy, the products and services of the organisation and which markets the organisation serves. You will also give insights of the organisational structure, opportunities, threats, strengths and weaknesses of the organisation.
NL: In dit onderdeel van de financieringsaanvraag geeft u inzicht in de onderneming. U gaat hierbij in op de aard van de onderneming, de missie en strategie, de producten en diensten die zij levert en welke markten er worden bediend. Daarnaast geeft u inzicht in de organisatiestructuur, kansen, bedreigingen en sterke en zwakke punten van de onderneming.
